Text:
Many thanks!
For those who want a really nice PDF of the LOTR trilogy, this is the best one I've come across. Not a conversion from ePub, but a true PDF copy. I'm tempted to ask the poster if he/she has any other Tolkien books that can be posted.
A great post! Well done!

I know it may be a big ask, but could you please upload retail versions(just like this), of the Hobbit(enhanced edition), The Silmarillion, The Tales from the Perilous Realm, The Unfinished Tales. If you can't it's alright.

Could you please upload retail version(just like this), of The Children of Hurin, The Tales of the Perilous Realm, The Hobbit and The Unfinished Tales. This is a big ask, so if you can't do it it's alright. Thanks
